CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 1, 1954, pg. 5 reads: "Murder Trial Starts - Frank Thompson of Hermitage Street, Homewood, is on trial this week before Criminal Court Judge Russell H. Adams for the Sept. 21 death of Vernon Corbin, allegedly killed by Thompson on Frankstown Avenue, in a "triangle affair" with Corbin's estranged wife, Pearline. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Police officer on left, wearing suit with badge, escorting alleged murderer Frank Thompson through corridor in Allegheny County Courthouse
